name: WayOfHeroes
description:
The game begins when our heroes come to the city Vorms. Residents of the city began to disappear after the arrival of dark power in their place. A local resident tells the hero - that in order to rid this area of evil otherworldly power - the mountain must destroy the book of the dead hidden in the dungeons under the city. The book is scattered on sheets in different corners of caves and dungeons. Only by collecting all the sheets can you destroy the whole book and all the evil in place with it.
